SEARCH
Package com.syncura360.controller

Class StaffController

java.lang.Object
com.syncura360.controller.StaffController
@RestController @CrossOrigin(origins="*") @RequestMapping("/staff") public class StaffController extends Object
Controller responsible for handling CRUD operations on staff credentials. Provides endpoints for updating, creating, retrieving, and managing staff members.

This controller ensures that operations are performed securely, and that only authenticated users with proper authorization can modify staff details.

Author:
Benjamin Leiby

  • Method Details

    • updateStaff

      @PutMapping("/batch") public org.springframework.http.ResponseEntity<StaffController.StaffUpdateResponse> updateStaff(@RequestHeader(name="Authorization") String authorization, @RequestBody StaffUpdateRequest staffUpdateRequest)
      Attempts to apply a list of staff information updates.

      This method allows an authorized user to batch update multiple staff records. If an update fails (either due to a staff member not existing or not being authorized), it will be tracked and communicated in the response.

      Parameters:
      authorization - the JWT token of the authorized user.
      staffUpdateRequest - the DTO containing a collection of attempted staff updates.
      Returns:
      a ResponseEntity containing a StaffController.StaffUpdateResponse with the result message and list of updated staff.

    • applyUpdates

      private void applyUpdates(Staff staff, Map<String,Object> fields)
      Applies updates to a staff member based on a field-value mapping.

      This method updates a staff entity with the provided field names and values. It supports common fields such as `username`, `role`, `firstName`, etc.

      Parameters:
      staff - the staff entity to update.
      fields - a map of field names and values to be updated.

    • createStaff

      @PostMapping public org.springframework.http.ResponseEntity<StaffCreationResponse> createStaff(@RequestHeader(name="Authorization") String authorization, @RequestBody StaffCreationRequest staffCreationRequest)
      Attempts to insert new staff members from a list of new staff information.

      This method allows an authorized user to add new staff members to the system. It securely hashes the password and associates the staff with the hospital the authenticated user works at.

      Parameters:
      authorization - the JWT token of the authorized user.
      staffCreationRequest - the DTO containing a collection of new staff member information.
      Returns:
      a ResponseEntity containing a StaffCreationResponse with the result message and list of added staff.

    • getAllStaff

      @GetMapping("/all") public org.springframework.http.ResponseEntity<StaffController.AllStaffDTO> getAllStaff(@RequestHeader(name="Authorization") String authorization)
      Retrieves the list of staff members' information at the accessing user's hospital.

      This method returns a list of all staff members working at the same hospital as the authenticated user.

      Parameters:
      authorization - the JWT token of the authorized user.
      Returns:
      a ResponseEntity containing an StaffController.AllStaffDTO with the list of staff information.
